name: SPARKUnit
short_description: SPARKUnit is a unit test framework for the SPARK programming language. It enables developers to create unit tests which can be analysed by the SPARK Examiner. This allows for testing of operations with preconditions and flow analysis of test cases.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Testing :: Performance Testing

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License
